dmca.title: Blue Glass Enterprises Complains of Images Used
dmca.body:
Google, Inc
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

I have inclosed [sic] copies with the offending images circled, these images are mine, photographed, edited, & used on my own site from where I beleave [sic] they were stolen from.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly inringed.

[Private]


[Private]

Blue Glass Enterprises
[Private]
[Private]
Livermore, California 94550
[Private]
[Private]@BlueGlassEnterprises.com

<HR>

Dear [Private]
http://www.mysticdreamsshoppe.com 
[Private]
San Diego, California 92117

It has come to my attention that you have made an unauthorized use of my copyrighted images. I have reserved all rights of these images, first published September 2003. I have inclosed [sic] examples of these infringments.

As you neither asked for nor received permission to use these images, nor to make of distribute copies, including electronic copies, of same, I believe you have willfully infringed my riqhts under 17 U.S.C. Section 101 et seq. and could be liable for statutory damages as high as $150,000 as set forth in Section 504(c)(2) therein.

I demand that you immediately cease the use and distribution of all infringing images, and all copies, including electronic copies, of same, that you deliver to me, if applicable, all unused, undistributed copies of same, or destroy such copies immediately and that you desist from this or any other infringement of my rights in the future. If I have not received an affirmative response from you by Friday the 5th March 2004 indicating that you have fully complied with these requirements, I shall take further action against you.

[Private]

You may contact me:

[Private]
Blue Glass Enterprises
[Private]
[Private]
Livermore, California 94550
[Private]
[Private]@BlueGlassEnteriprises.com
